title: Dear Riot Plz fix malzahar
body: I don't need to explain just fix him

replies.body:
If Malz gets on top of you, you lose, IF. It is a pretty big if.

I main Malz, I should know, he has no poke, almost no initiation, no survivability and the only thing he has going for him is his easy farm and wave clear. Once his minions get going, your screwed, just attack him before that happens.
just learn how to engage him effectively. he's not that broken, brand is worse
